## Analysis

```{r analysis}

model1 = lm(IRI_TomaPerspectiva_DIRd ~ AIM_DIRt, DF)

table_model = gtsummary::tbl_regression(model1, intercept = TRUE) %>% 
  # add_global_p() %>%
  bold_labels() %>% 
  italicize_levels() %>% 
  add_glance_table(include = c("nobs", "df.residual", "r.squared", "adj.r.squared"))

table_model

# report::report(model1)

paste0("Socio economic level was not asignificant predictor of WEBEXEC_DIRt, beta = ", 
       gtsummary::inline_text(table_model, variable = AIM_DIRt))

```
